description: Generate a vector data cube of points by sampling regularly-spaced points from input geometries.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description:
Input geometries for sample extraction. Vector properties are preserved for vector data cubes and all GeoJSON Features.

To maximize interoperability, a nested `GeometryCollection` should be avoided. Furthermore, a `GeometryCollection` composed of a single type of geometries should be avoided in favour of the corresponding multi-part type (e.g. `MultiPolygon`).

parameters.name: cell_size
parameters.description: The size in degrees of the cell of the regular grid. If the cell size is bigger than the geometry, a single point is returned located in the centroid of the geometry. If the centroid is not enclosed in the geometry area, no point is returned.

returns.description: Returns a vector data cube with the sampled points as `MultiPoint` per geometry given.
